title: FBA Fulfillment Removal Order Detail Data
description: FBA Fulfillment Removal Order Detail Data Reports

request-date.description: The date and time the removal order was requested

order-id.description: The unique identifier for the order associated with the removal

order-type.description: The type of the removal order

order-status.description: The status of the removal order

last-updated-date.description: The date and time when the data was last updated

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit for the item

fnsku.description: The Fulfillment Network Stock Keeping Unit for the item

disposition.description: The method used to dispose of the items

requested-quantity.description: The quantity of items requested for removal

cancelled-quantity.description: The quantity of items that were cancelled for removal

disposed-quantity.description: The quantity of items that were disposed during the removal process

shipped-quantity.description: The quantity of items that have been shipped for removal

in-process-quantity.description: The quantity of items currently in the removal process

removal-fee.description: The fee charged for the removal of items

currency.description: The currency in which the removal fee is charged

dataEndTime.description: The end time of the data record
